function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of COVID-19 crisis management plan","Impact":"Unpreparedness for a pandemic crisis","Mitigation":"Develop and implement a comprehensive crisis management plan","Technologies":"Crisis management software, communication tools, remote work technology","People":"Hospital management, nursing staff, patients","Owner":"Top-level management, crisis management team"},{"Description":"Shortage in nursing staff","Impact":"Inadequate patient care, increased workload, risk of staff burnout","Mitigation":"Recruit additional nursing staff, provide training and support, optimize workflow and processes","Technologies":"Recruitment software, training modules, workflow management tools","People":"Nursing staff, patients","Owner":"Human resources, nursing management"}]}
